Eman Elassi (amụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1985) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara nchịkwa azụmaahịa tupu ọ bụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri.
Ọrụ ime ihe nkiri ya malitere mgbe onye nduzi Khaled Bahgat hụrụ foto ya na akwụkwọ magazin
Ọ kpọtụrụ ya ma nye ya ọrụ na usoro telivishọn a na-akpọ Ams La Ymout (Yesterday Does Not Die)
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ Raghda na Riadh al-Khouli dị ka nwa nwanyị Raghda
Ọrụ ọzọ ọ rụrụ bụ na usoro Ahlam fi al-Bowaba (Dreams in the Gate), nke Haitham Hakki duziri
Kemgbe ahụ, ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn.
